byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis and Michael Schmidt contributed reporting.
byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

abstract: Democratic senators attack Iowa Republican Sen Charles E Grassley, who as Judiciary Committee chairman is refusing to hold hearing on Pres Obama's nominee to Supreme Court; in other sign of pressure on Grassley, former Iowa lieutenant governor Patty Judge will seek Democratic senate nomination to challenge him for re-election.
lead_paragraph: Patty Judge, a former Iowa lieutenant governor and state agriculture secretary, will seek the Democratic nomination to challenge the senator, who is seeking a seventh term.

headline.main: Charles Grassley Faces Formidable Challenger in Iowa Senate Race
headline.print_headline: Democrats Focus on Iowa Senator in Court Fight

snippet: Patty Judge, a former Iowa lieutenant governor and state agriculture secretary, will seek the Democratic nomination to challenge the senator, who is seeking a seventh term.
